author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Victoria Programme And GOL Smiles Extend Their PartnershipTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Victoria Programme And GOL Smiles Extend Their Partnership  
TAP and GOL have extended their partnership to their loyalty programmes – Victoria and Smiles. This partnership gives Victoria Clients the chance to save between 70% and 100% of the miles travelled on GOL flights on their Victoria Card. To ensure the miles are automatically credited to a Victoria account, the client needs only enter their TP number (Victoria number) while making their booking.
Similarly, GOL Smiles Programme members can now earn miles on all TAP flights.
Smiles Victoria Clients have been able to use their miles on TAP and GOL flights since the end of 2014.
This partnership’s goal is to develop Victoria’s and TAP’s growth, dynamism and diversification strategy in the Brazilian market.
 
Source:- Tap Portugal
